content: Hey, apologies if this is the wrong place to ask this question. I was wondering if anyone has had a go at getting User Mode Linux to work under wasmtime? I did a bit of googling and it'll run under musl libc since 2015 – it'd be pretty neat if it could work, and I might take a look if nobody else has already done it.
I can't see any options to delete this topic, but I've since thought it through more and it's not a practical idea. Please ignore :)
